entry.title: Ceres local parameterization
entry.summary:
Parameterization 使用一个表达方式去表达一个另一个系统.

Local Parameterization

In many cases, some parameters lie on a manifold other than Euclidean space, e.g., rotation matrices. In such cases, the user can specify the geometry of the local tangent space by specifying a LocalParameterization object.

https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/ceres-solver/7HfF6DnCv7o
